title: Seeing pies in a dream by Sheikh Saleh Al-Osaimi

preview.html: Seeing pies in a dream has many connotations, but it depends on knowing the details of the dream and the social status of the dreamer. Pies in Al-Osaimi’s dream Seeing pies in a dream has a good and bad meaning. Seeing him in a dream means that the dreamer will fall into the plot of professionally managing it to feed him. It also symbolizes deception and hypocrisy that makes The viewer comes down to those close to him. But if one sees a pie in a circular shape, this is a sign that one is trying to find food that is right, but with justice and law. Perhaps it indicates the fulfillment of dreams and desires. Seeing dough in the dream of an unmarried girl. Dreams of dough fermented and entering the oven to arrange is an indication of the approaching date of her wedding As she indicated, her dreams came true. As for the cohesive dough in the dream, it shows the strength of character, durability, and effort in achieving goals. The white dough in the dream appears worse than the purity and jacket of that girl. As for seeing herself eating raw dough without flattening it, this indicates her haste in making important decisions in her life. As for whoever sees herself eating dough and it tastes delicious, it is a sign of joyful news. Dreaming of eating raw dough and cutting it. See the dough. If it is raw and eaten and its taste is not delicious or spicy, then it is not good because it shows faster growth. If it tastes sweet and delicious, this indicates happy events and good news. If you Dreaming that you are cutting the dough into small pieces, this is a sign of good management of matters. Seeing white dough in a dream. Anyone who dreams of seeing white dough is a sign of morals and excessive generosity. The puffy dough and its extra size is evidence of a spacious and blessed livelihood. Yeast kept in the refrigerator indicates immunity and security. Seeing pancakes in a dream, single woman Who do you see yourself preparing? Pancakes Sugar shows her ability to manage the affairs of her home and life. Pancakes were mentioned in a dream, unmarried women Relationships with a man in some cases it is a sincere relationship and in other cases it is a temporary relationship. Seeing eating pancakes tart It indicates the presence of haters About it. Add the dream you would like to interpret, indicating your marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about removing lice from the hair of a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about removing lice from a married woman’s hair: Seeing lice in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will get rid of problems in her life, God willing, especially if she sees that she is killing these lice, as well as the following interpretations: The interpreter scholar Ibn Sirin says: If lice falls from a married woman’s hair and is scattered On earth, the vision may indicate a lot of goodness that she will receive. As other commentators say, the appearance of lice from the hair of a married woman in a dream indicates that she will get rid of the problems she suffers from. If a married woman sees lice emerging from the hair of her clothes, this indicates However, she will be promoted at work and the promotion will bring many benefits to her. If a married woman sees herself in a dream, combing her hair to get rid of lice, this means that she will get rid of enemies, haters, and envious people. See also: Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair and killing it. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing lice in a dream The married woman: Ibn Sirin says that seeing a married woman suffering from lice in her dream indicates that there is a very bad person around her who does not wish her well, and also the following: Ibn Sirin says: The interpretation of the appearance of lice in a dream indicates the weakness of people, but they are enemies of the wife. A bite indicates Lice in a dream indicates weak harm to a married woman, but from a weak enemy. A pinch of lice in a dream indicates many fears and sorrows. Eating lice in a married woman’s dream indicates lies, sins, and gossip. An explanation of the abundance of lice in the hair of a married woman in her dream. The abundance of lice indicates... The head of a married woman in a dream indicates a long illness for her or that she will suffer a lot in her life, in addition to the following interpretations: Seeing a lot of lice in the hair means that he has committed sins, evil thinking and deception. The many lice that walk on the head of a married woman also show the dreamer’s bad thoughts. If a woman cuts off her head in a dream from lice, this indicates that she expels negative thoughts from her thoughts. The interpretation of killing lice in a married woman’s dream indicates her victory and salvation from her enemies. An indication of the presence of lice in a married woman’s dream. A married woman sees lice in her dream, and this dream has interpretations. It has many connotations, including: The dream indicates that he will have a calm and trouble-free life. The appearance of lice on a married woman’s clothes may indicate that she is in a financial crisis. The interpretation of seeing lice in the marital bed indicates marital problems and disputes. Lice in the husband’s hair in a woman’s dream For a married woman, this indicates that something bad happened to him or that he committed sins and disobedience. Such as the interpretation of a dream about removing lice from a married woman’s hair, this indicates that the problems she is suffering from will soon end. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of killing a married woman with lice in her dream. Most interpretation scholars say: If a woman sees If a married woman kills lice in her dream, this means that she will get rid of the problems of her marital life, as well as the following interpretations: Ibn Sirin interpreted the vision of a married woman killing lice in her dream as a serious dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about pink pants for one girl

preview.html: It is also called the feminine color, because it is in fact one of the most beautiful and attractive colors. But if a girl dreams of pink, what is its interpretation? This is what we will answer in this article. Interpretation of a dream about the color pink for a single girl by the translator Ibn Sirin. The great translator Ibn Sirin says that if a girl dreams of the color pink in her dream. This indicates kindness, love, and tenderness in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. As if a single woman is also dreaming That she was wearing a pink dress in her dream. This dream indicates that this single girl will enjoy good luck and will also live a romantic life. Likewise, all scholars agreed that the color pink in general. It shows that an unmarried girl will get engaged if she is not engaged. Like that girl She was engaged. Her dream shows that this girl will get married, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Also, if an unmarried girl dreams that she is wearing a pink dress in her dream. This dream indicates that there will be warm feelings between this girl and the person who will propose to her. But if she sees an unmarried girl A married woman in her dream is that she is wearing a pink dress. This dream indicates that this single girl will enjoy a more beautiful life than she can imagine. We chose for you: Interpretation of seeing pants in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about wearing pants for a single girl. If a girl sees in her dream that she is wearing pants. Where this dream appears to me This girl will be blessed by God Almighty with very good protection, justice and piety. This dream also indicates that the unmarried girl will get married. Also, dreaming of wide pants in a dream is better than narrow pants. Tight pants indicate problems, obstacles and worries, as well as dirty and dirty pants. And torn ones. Wide and long pants are better in a dream. As these pants symbolize a jacket, purity, and happiness. Interpretation of a dream about seeing pants for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she sees in her sleep a store full of pants. This dream indicates that this woman will be blessed by God Almighty with a lot of luck. And happiness. If a married woman sees that she is wearing new pants and that she is also buying them with her husband. This dream indicates that this married woman will have many good things in the near future, God willing. Also, the married woman was wearing red pants during her sleep. This dream indicates However, the married woman will be blessed with a pregnancy soon, God willing. Interpretation of seeing pants in a dream for a married and single woman, according to Ibn Sirin. The great interpreter Ibn Sirin says: If a married woman sees pants in her dream, this dream portends marital happiness, and she will live a stable life between her and her husband in a good way. Privately, and in her life in general. Also, if an unmarried girl sees pants in her dream. This dream portends that a young man will propose to this single girl, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation, as this young man is characterized by generosity, generosity, and giving. Like a girl who saw in her dream that she was wearing pants. loose during her sleep. This dream is evidence that the girl is not...

title: The most important interpretations of seeing a broken mobile phone in a dream

preview.html: A broken cell phone in a dream is one of the things that will catch the attention of many. We worry about our cell phones even in our dreams, so what about breaking, cracking, falling into water or from a great height. This matter has been recorded for you in this article.Broken cell phone in a dreamA broken cell phone in the dreams of many symbolizes the inability to move forward in life and shows that the dreamer will experience many failures and problems in his future, which he will be able to overcome, but with great difficulty. He won't forget what it was like. He suffered throughout his life. Also, breaking a phone in a dream is one of the things that indicates a problem in the dreamer’s relationship with his family and warns him that his relationship with them is in a deplorable state, which requires him to stop avoiding them. And trying to get close to them again so as not to expose himself to misfortune and his loneliness spells the end of life. Breaking a cell phone in a dream by Ibn Sirin Cell phones were not something that the scholar Ibn Sirin was contemporary with, but nevertheless there were many means of communication in his time, which His Holiness explained a lot about. Seeing him, and by analogy with these interpretations, we had this opinion. If the dreamer sees during his sleep that his mobile phone is broken, this means that he has lost many important and essential things in his life, which will make him feel sad and sad because of the great importance and value of these things. . In it.While a woman who sees her cell phone broken in her dream, it symbolizes her failure to form healthy family and dating relationships, and the majority of her relationships are characterized by tension and nervousness, which is one of the things caused by a lack of trust. To others and her constant doubts about most topics and people in her life. The Asrar Dream Interpretation website is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. All you have to do is type the Asrar Dream Interpretation website in Google and get the correct interpretations. Broken mobile phone in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that her cell phone is broken, symbolizes the presence of many psychological problems that she suffers from in her life and that cause her a lot of stress. In dealing with many people, she must seek help from a doctor. Who treats her? To be able to adapt to the circumstances that happen to her. While the girl is holding her phone and is surprised that it breaks in her dream, this indicates that she will face many family problems that she will not be able to overcome easily due to the psychological and physical effects that are difficult to bear. The mobile screen is scratched, dream interpretation For single women: An unmarried woman who sees scratches on the mobile screen in her dream, her vision indicates her inability to get rid of the problems and crises that she is going through in her life and which cause her a lot of sadness and unhappiness, so she needs to relieve herself. As much as possible so that she can live with her reality. While if a girl sees herself crying during her sleep because of scratches on her phone screen, this symbolizes

title: The most important interpretations of Ibn Sirin about seeing a camel in a dream for a married woman and escaping from a camel in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Seeing a camel in a dream for a married woman Interpreters believe that the dream leads to good and brings many good tidings to the dreamer, but it can bring some negative connotations in some cases, and in the lines of this article we will talk about the interpretation of seeing a camel for a married woman. The lips of Ibn Sirin and the great scholars of interpretation. Seeing a camel in a dream for a married woman Scholars interpreted camels in a dream for a married woman as being patient in trials and content with God Almighty's destiny, good and evil. Many responsibilities fall on her relationship, but she hides what she feels from others. It is said that the camel in a married woman's dream indicates that her partner thinks differently from her, she does not have the ability to understand with him, he is jealous of her and restricts her in many matters. She goes through. Also, seeing a raging camel is evidence that the dreamer gets angry quickly and this causes many problems with her partner, so she needs to change and become calmer. It is also a material luxury in the coming tomorrow, and if the owner of the dream sees the beauty of the building, this indicates her love and devotion to her husband, standing by him in his difficult times, and supporting him in many matters. Seeing a camel in a dream for a married woman in Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets riding a camel in a dream as a sign of obtaining a great material benefit from an unknown man soon and also an indication of the dreamer's intelligence and his enjoyment of many skills and talents or working in a specific matter. The camel's hump in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer is arrogant and has a bad mood, so he needs to change to gain people's love and respect. If the dreamer sees the camel running at a frightening speed in her dream, this is a sign of her insistence on success and her excessive diligence in work because she does not find time to rest or relax. If the dreamer rides the camel upside down in her dream, this means that she will soon meet a bad friend and will have to be careful of her, and if the dreamer sees the camel standing and not moving, this symbolizes the return of her husband from his trip soon and having fun with him, and the camel that suddenly stops running and sits in its seat indicates that the married woman will soon suffer from some diseases. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google the online dream interpretation site, which includes thousands of interpretations by senior scholars of interpretation. The most important interpretations of seeing a camel in a dream for a married woman Escaping from a camel in a dream for a married woman If the dreamer sees camels running away from her in her dream, this is a sign of a person who intends to harm her, but he appears to her to be loving and caring, so she must be careful and not be deceived by human appearances. Read the Holy Quran. title: Is the death of a father in a dream good news?

preview.html: The death of a father in a dream is good news. A person feels very afraid and enters a state of fear if he sees in his dream the death of his father and immediately expects that the father will fall into evil or illness that may lead to death, God forbid, but it is death. Father in a dream good news? We answer this question on the Interpretation of Dreams website, so follow us. The death of a father in a dream is good news. Dream interpreters explain that the death of a father in a dream is good news for the dreamer, because it is an indication of the clear love that the person has for his father, and therefore he is very afraid of losing him, and therefore he may witness His death is due to some thoughts running through his mind, but they are not real and have nothing to do with awakening. Imam Nabulsi says that the death of a father in a dream is good for a person to achieve great ambitions, and the father can help him achieve them, because he supports him and brings him close and does not sting him. His love and knowledge carry him forward. If you see the death of a father in your dream and he is dead in reality, then you are a person who carries compassion and love in your heart, and you also pray to him and obey him even after his death regarding his connection. Kinship and closeness to your sisters. The death of a father in a dream is good news for Ibn Sirin. The dream of the death of a father, according to Ibn Sirin, symbolizes the good relationship between the dreamer and his father, and therefore he wishes to remain with him always, but he may become anxious if he finds him sad or sick. Ibn Sirin the dreamer is reassured when He finds the death of his father in the vision and says about the father that he will have a long life and will not be accompanied by a serious illness. He is achieving great success and prosperity, and he is distinguished in his work, God willing, meaning that the matter is related to the father’s goodness and not his evil, and the interpretation may express the dreamer’s journey to reality. To reach To the most accurate interpretation of your dream, Google's online dream interpretation, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. The death of a father in a dream is good news for a single woman. If a girl sees the death of her father in a dream, she will likely be sad and shocked, but the dream does not interpret Evil is either for her or for her father, because it expresses reaching a great profit for him or her. Related to him. If an unmarried woman is exposed to the death of her father in a dream and he treats her in an undesirable way in reality and neglects her in his home, then the matter is a warning to him about the need to leave his bad circumstances. . He commits crimes against his family and feels very sad because of the mistreatment he has already caused them. The death of a father in a dream is good news for a married woman. When a father dies in a married woman’s dream, she becomes anxious, insecure, and very terrified because of the news that came to her in a dream, but the death of the father is a good thing. Very expressive of abandonment. The financial crisis. And to pay off all her debts, God willing, because they are urgent and reach her heart with security and reassurance. The death of a father in a married woman’s dream is a good omen for her with the success of some of the planning she has made for work or life goals. If the father has died in reality, the dream is interpreted as her desire to sit together and talk for a long time as before, but she misses him and feels sad after saying goodbye to him. The death of the father in a dream is good news.

title: I dreamed that I had intercourse with my brother, so what is the interpretation of the dream?

preview.html: I dreamed that I had sex with my brother. What is the interpretation of this vision? Is it as disgusting as it really is? These are questions that are on the mind of the dreamer when he sees this dream, and therefore in this article we have provided the most accurate explanations that he needs to reassure his heart, and these explanations come from the words of great scholars such as Ibn Sirin. Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen only need to read this content. I dreamed that I had sex with my brother. Dream interpretation books indicate that seeing someone having sex with a brother in a dream indicates the collapse of the differences between them and that relations will return to their best conditions. It indicates many good things that seek to maintain their relationship together. If there is an interruption between a brother and his brother, and they are copulating in a dream, this leads to peace and reconciliation in any problem that arises between them, along with entering into common benefits that make them both want to grow from their personality It will be a bond and strength to each other, and therefore this vision is good for whoever sees it, so it is not as hateful as in reality. I dreamed that I had intercourse with my brother Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin states that whoever sees himself getting married with his brother in a dream proves the extent of the family bond that surrounds him. The state of despair indicates that there is a misunderstanding between them, but they will be able to reconcile soon. If a man sees himself marrying his sister in a dream, this symbolizes how pure the relationship between them is and that they are in a state of understanding and love that binds them to each other for life. Especially if the father has died, he must show how much he cares. I know more than 2,000 interpretations by Ibn Sirin. A site about the secrets of dream interpretation from Google. I dreamed that I was in contact with my only brother. When an unmarried woman sees that her brother is connected to her and feels sorry for crying, this indicates a feeling of injustice She was wronged by him, or perhaps he attacked her verbally with harsh words. If a girl sees her brother having intercourse with her, and then her father sees her, this indicates the outbreak of some family disputes that it is best to resolve quickly so that the situation does not escalate. I dreamed that I had intercourse with my brother with a married woman. When a married woman sees that her brother is tying her in a dream, this represents the profits that they exchange with him. Each other, either by marrying their children to each other or by entering into a joint venture from which they gain money, fame, and influence. Her brother and she wants to see him, especially if there has been a fight and conflict between them for a long time. I dreamed that I was in contact with my pregnant brother. When a pregnant woman sees her brother in a dream connecting with her, this is a sign that the time of birth is approaching and that she will give birth to the child safely and comfortably in the rest of the pregnancy period and ease in childbirth. I dreamed that I had intercourse with my brother about a divorced woman. A divorced woman’s contact with her brother in a dream is a symbol of her brother’s support for her in all her problems that are heaped upon her, either by her family, by her ex-husband’s family, or by her husband himself. . To help her reach a point of understanding and reconciliation with a wonderful self, and if the dreamer sees another person marrying his sister in her dream, this indicates a change in her financial situation with...

title: Interpretation of seeing a small mouse in a dream for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a small mouse in a dream for a married woman indicates the emergence of problems, crises, disagreements, and problems in marital life, and it also symbolizes an attempt by friends to destroy her life and make many plans that she may find in a well full of evil as a result of envy from close people. For her.Seeing a small mouse in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a small mouse cutting her clothes in a dream, this is considered one of the unexpected dreams that indicate the emergence of negative things. We find that the husband will insult his wife for something and this may lead to accusations against her. She heard it, so she flees to her father’s house, and he will learn of his mistake and show the woman’s innocence, but she refuses to return. A married woman’s vision that her husband turned into a small mouse and was not afraid of him in a dream shows that he is one of the weak personalities as he allows people to control him and his actions with their words and this will bring about the result of this. Seeing mice entering a married woman’s house and running away from her is evidence that there are many friends near her who are trying to destroy her relationship with her husband, so she must be careful, control her friends, and know who is good and who wishes her harm. . Seeing a small mouse in a dream about a married woman in Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dream. Seeing a small mouse in a married woman’s dream is a sign of crises and problems occurring between her and her husband. While seeing many mice in a dream means earning halal money from a reliable source. As for seeing black mice in a dream, it symbolizes the deception and slander that he will commit in his life. Seeing a white mouse in a dream indicates a married woman’s mistreatment of others. If a woman sees a small mouse in her bed, the vision shows her husband’s rejection, because there is another woman in his life. A pregnant woman who dreams of a small mouse trying to enter her house, but it pushes it out and succeeds, symbolizes that she will suffer from a health problem during her pregnancy, but she will recover and give birth to a healthy child. Seeing a pregnant woman with a small mouse trying to cut off her clothes in a dream indicates that she has accumulated debts and that they are going through financial hardship, but she must be patient and in time all of this will disappear. Seeing a group of small-sized mice in a dream represents the bad choice of friends around them who are trying to cause them harm. In many problems and crises. Interpretation of seeing mice in a dream for a married woman. Mice in a dream for a married woman symbolize deception, plans, problems, crises and problems, so she must be careful with those around her. A married woman who sees mice in her home indicates that she is close to many people who She thought they were good, but she will find that they are planning schemes and judgments to lead her to evil and corruption and are trying to destroy her home. It is possible that the vision also indicates the problems and difficulties that the wife finds in dealing with her husband because of the people around her. A mouse bite in

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the president in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing the president in a dream? The president is one of the expressions of love and affection between people, whether that is from a mother to her child, or from a husband to his wife, or between friends and brothers, but when seeing it in a dream, it shows the emotional state that, as a person experiences, his need for feelings of love, tenderness, and kindness from the other party. ..what he saw, so let's learn together in the following lines more private interpretations of great scholars such as Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi in different cases. Still do not find an interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for an Egyptian website for interpreting dreams. Interpretation of seeing the president in a dream by Ibn Sirin When a rich man sees kisses in a dream, this is a sign of progress for the imam in order to achieve the rest of the ambitions and aspirations that he seeks. In the event that you see an enemy kissing you on the forehead or on the head, this is A sign that you are facing some problems in the work environment with colleagues or on the part of siblings, which often end well. Interpretation of a dream about kissing someone: When one sees himself in a dream, kissing another person close to him, such as a life partner or a parent, as well as some Siblings, this is a sign of the bad treatment he receives from that person, making you feel lost and deprived, therefore kisses always appear in a dream as the mind translates. These feelings take the form of different visions and dreams. If the patient sees this in a dream, this indicates his desire to receive psychological support from those around him to help him overcome this hardship or health crisis, and he is not unemployed or a person who cannot find a suitable job. If a single girl sees herself kissing someone in a dream, this is a sign of her need to satisfy her affection in the current period after separating from her lover or fiancé. Which prompts her to reconnect. To satisfy this passion and if you dream of a stranger kissing her head, then this is a sign that someone is proposing marriage to her, who will offer her all the feelings of love and tenderness. A kiss in a dream for a married woman, and if it is a married woman who sees this, it may mean that she is going through a period of emotional indifference Or she does not have a close marital relationship, and therefore she feels sad for her and wants love and ambiguous feelings. Between her and her man to return again. Sources: - 1- The Book of Selected Words in the Interpretation of Dreams, Muhammad Ibn Sirin, Dar Al-Ma’rifa, Beirut 2000. 2- The Dictionary of the Interpretation of Dreams, by Ibn Sirin and Sheikh Abdul-Ghani Al-Nabulsi, researched by Basil Breidi. Al Safa Library, Abu Dhabi 2008. 3- The Book of Perfumes of Dreams as an Expression of a Dream, Sheikh Abdul Ghani Al-Nabulsi.
